title: Blended Learning-Based Project Course for Sustaining Point-of-Care Ultrasound (POCUS) Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Principles of Echocardiography and Anatomical Structures
context.additional_context: Practical skills maintenance program for learners in medical device management/leadership roles, utilizing handheld ultrasound devices.

learning_goals: Learners must accurately acquire five standard cardiac POCUS views (PLAX, PSAX, A4C, S4C, SIVC).
Learners must demonstrate an improvement of at least 2 points (out of 10) in image quality scores at the 8-week post-assessment compared to baseline.
Learners must develop and present POCUS application scenarios through project-based team activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
